mapper.select: /* 수집건수 */ /* down_countsCollected */ SELECT DATE(b.regdate) AS date, sum(b.cnt) as cnt FROM ( select a.idx, a.regdate, 1 as cnt from ( select ism.idx, st.regdate from sched_trigger st inner join items_sched_mapping ism on ism.sc_id = st.sc_id inner join items it on it.idx = ism.idx where st.regdate between concat(#{sdate}, ' 00:00:00') and concat(#{edate}, ' 23:59:59') and st.type = 'C' and st.stat in ('S','F') group by ism.idx ) a ) b GROUP BY date

/* 추출건수 */ /* down_countsAnalyzed */ SELECT DATE(b.regdate) AS date, sum(b.cnt) as cnt FROM ( select a.idx, a.regdate, 1 as cnt from ( select ism.idx, st.regdate from sched_trigger st inner join items_sched_mapping ism on ism.sc_id = st.sc_id inner join items it on it.idx = ism.idx where st.regdate between concat(#{sdate}, ' 00:00:00') and concat(#{edate}, ' 23:59:59') and st.type = 'A' and st.stat in ('S') group by ism.idx ) a ) b GROUP BY date
/* getCountInsertedDaily */ select count(*) from items where stat != 'M' and regdate1 between concat(#{sdate}, ' 00:00:00') and concat(#{edate}, ' 23:59:59')

/* getCountItemsHistByType */ select ith.type, ith.stat, count(*) as cnt from items_hist ith inner join items it on it.idx = ith.idx and it.stat != 'M' where ith.type in ( 'collect', 'analyze', 'meta' ) and ith.regdate between concat(#{sdate}, ' 00:00:00') and concat(#{edate}, ' 23:59:59') group by ith.type, ith.stat

/* getCountsItemsByStatUniq */ select a.type,a.stat,count(*) as cnt from ( select ih.type, ih.stat, ih.idx from items_hist ih inner join items it on it.idx = ih.idx and it.stat != 'M' where ih.type in ('collect', 'analyze', 'meta') and ih.regdate between concat(#{sdate}, ' 00:00:00') and concat(#{edate}, ' 23:59:59') group by ih.type, ih.stat, ih.idx ) a group by a.type, a.stat
